Hero.career: Software Engineer, Full Stack Developer, SEO Expert
Hero.greeting: Give life to that idea you have, we will create it together!

applab.achievement1: Managed end-to-end front-end development, consistently demonstrating strong coding skills and a keen eye for UI/UX design.
applab.achievement2: Collaborated with a team of 4+ developers and designers to successfully deliver 7+ dynamic web applications, leading to improved client satisfaction.
applab.achievement3: Conducted regular meetings and consultations with clients to gather feedback, clarify requirements, and present progress updates.
applab.achievement4: Demonstrated adaptability by quickly acquiring proficiency in REACT and VUE through self-guided learning and hands-on experimentation.

rour.achievement1: Engineered a property rental application complete with integrated online payment functionality.
rour.achievement2: Mastered the use of cutting-edge web technologies, including the development of PWA applications.
rour.achievement3: Evaluated and selected optimal solutions for authentication, security, storage, analytics, and performance across the development of different web pages.
rour.achievement4: Developed multiple user stories by applying various technologies correctly.

dacomp.achievement1: Collaborated with multiple teams across different company projects.
dacomp.achievement2: Android Focus: Fixed multiple issues across the company's various mobile applications.
dacomp.achievement3: SpringBoot Backend Focus: Created new endpoints to expand the functionality of the company's multiple services.

cdc.company: Club CDC: Centro de Desarrollo de Software y Capacitación
cdc.achievement1: Worked as an administrator, managing the club's operations.
cdc.achievement2: Collaborated with a student team to develop multiple applications aimed at learning and improving university programs.
cdc.achievement3: Developed a program alongside a student team, adhering to the internationally recognized ISO 29110 standard.
